column4: that won't remove the users configuration files found in /home..
can you please show us how to do that?
there's a hidden .mozilla directory in /home that can be renamed.. once renamed FF won't see it.  Use nautilus and hit ctrl+h to reveal the hidden directories and look for one starting with .mozilla
if FF is open when you rename the directory you'll have to restart it for the change to take effect.. it will recreate the directory with default items.
